value.title: AI Used To Unlock Secrets of Ancient Texts
value.excerpt: To preserve historical accounts of humanity, texts have been kept safely stored away in libraries and monasteries all over the world. A large amount of this material has never been read. Now, researchers are developing an artificial neural network to read complex ancient handwriting based on human perception to improve capabilities of deep learning transcription.

value.title: Honeypot security technique can also stop attacks in natural language processing
value.excerpt: As online fake news detectors and spam filters become more sophisticated, so do attackers' methods to trick them—including attacks through the "universal trigger." In this learning-based method, an attacker uses a phrase or set of words to fool an indefinite number of inputs.
